pages.title: Heal
pages.text: $(bold)TYPE:$() $(l:mechanics/spells_types)Multi Type$() $(br)$(bold)COST: Lv1 = $(spell) + White Bed $(br)$(bold)Lv2 = $(spell) + $(#419daf)Ghast Tear$() $(br)$(bold)MAX LEVEL:$() $(#green)2$() $(br)$(bold)XP COST:$() 【 Lv1 = $(#green)4$() 】•【 Lv2 = $(#green)8$() 】$(br2)$(italic)''The ultimate spell for keeping your allies alive during combat or healing your pets!''$()

When casting $(#31AF2B)$(bold)Heal$(), a fairy projectile is cast from your scroll. $(br2)When $(#31AF2B)$(bold)Heal$() hits an entity, it will apply $(bold)Instant Health$() to them. $(br2)Depending on the level of the spell, the positive impact on the target's health will increase. $(br2)$(bold)Tip: $(italic)The scroll is a one-time use.$()
